channel.title: News/updated wiki pages
channel.description:
[html]

New Pages =========

– Advanced Users! Whonix modular flexible .d style configuration folders: https://www.whonix.org/wiki/Whonix_Configuration_Files

– Advanced Users! How to skip/blacklist selected Whonix Postinst Scripts: https://www.whonix.org/wiki/Skipping_Whonix_Postinst_Scripts

– Esoteric! Getting the global system DNS resolver working on Whonix-Gateway (usually recommended against and unnecessary: https://www.whonix.org/wiki/Whonix-Gateway_System_DNS

Updated pages =============

– https://www.whonix.org/wiki/Comparison_with_Others – https://www.whonix.org/wiki/Dev/Control_Port_Filter_Proxy – https://www.whonix.org/wiki/Trust

[/html]
